name: Smothering Encouragement
outcome: [AttackerName] teasingly strokes [TargetName]'s face with [AttackerHisOrHer] damp, bare feet, egging him at her leisure, every touch of her delectable feet sending shivers through his body...
miss: [AttackerName] teasingly strokes [TargetName]'s face with [AttackerHisOrHer] damp, bare feet, egging him at her leisure, but he seems to slowly regain control of himself, resisting the pleasure...
statusOutcome: The raw, unrestrained aroma of her bare feet asasults your senses, the unbearably exciting smell making your head spin!
